ComicInfo.Title: VARGR
ComicInfo.Summary:
James Bond is in Berlin, alone, unarmed and with no idea of the forces ranged in secret against him. If he can make it to the Embassy, he might survive for a few hours more. But he's getting into that car with that woman, which means he has only minutes to live...
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A/Reg | Regular Cover | Dom Reardon | 1 | B/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Francesco Francavilla | 2 | C/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive Cover | Gabriel Hardman | 3 | D/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive Cover | Dan Panosian | 4 | E/LE | Rare "Virgin Art" Edition Cover | Dom Reardon | 5 | F/RE | Dynamic Forces Exclusive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Francesco Francavilla | 6 | G/LE | Ultra Rare Limited Edition "Black & White" Cover, Limited to 100 | Gabriel Hardman | 7 |
